content.text:
# 2015 Empire Slovak Open – Singles

Danka Kovinić
| runner   =  Margarita Gasparyan
| score    = 7–5, 6–3
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Anna Karolína Schmiedlová was the defending champion, but she chose not to participate.
Danka Kovinić won the title, defeating Margarita Gasparyan in the final, 7–5, 6–3.
Seeds
Tereza Smitková (quarterfinals)
#  Aleksandra Krunić (quarterfinals)
#  Klára Koukalová (first round)
#  Tímea Babos (first round)
#  Evgeniya Rodina (first round)
#  Yanina Wickmayer (second round)
#  Zhang Shuai (first round)
#  Anna-Lena Friedsam (first round)
}}
